pre_caption_prompt: The video is a scenery shot. You do not need to describe the subject motion. Just note that briefly in one to three sentences.
pre_caption:
This breathtaking night scene showcases the vibrant green aurora borealis illuminating a starry sky. A tall, snow-dusted evergreen tree stands prominently in the center of the frame, rising from a snowy landscape dotted with a forest of other pines.

This is a time-lapse video. The aurora and clouds can be seen moving across the sky.
